string: Point out a special enemy using the "shout out" command.
Wait, I'm not dead yet! I
Revive or uncuff any teammate ##revive## times.
...and that's a lot of cash V
Defeat four Law enforcers with a single Trip Mine.
Beat a heist after having been the only one alive. (4 teammates).
...and that's a lot of cash I
Using the Reinbeck 880, defeat ##reinbeck_spooc_kill## Cloakers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the Brenner 21, defeat ##hk21_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Beat SLAUGHTERHOUSE within 15 minutes, taking all the gold. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Complete Slaughterhouse on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
Defeat ##tank_kill## Bulldozers. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Stay inside THE MAIN ROOM in SLAUGHTERHOUSE for an hour or more. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Using the Compact-5, defeat ##mp5_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Defeat a Bulldozer with a shotgun.
Get a Heavy SWAT to give up.
...and that's a lot of cash IX
Defeat ##law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL difficulty, with your group accuracy being at 60% or higher. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.
Using the Amcar-4, defeat ##m4_spooc_head_shot## Cloakers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Beat all original heists on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty and show them all you are on top! Completing this will make you golden!
Complete Heat Street on OVERKILL difficulty.
Using the Locomotive 12G, defeat ##mossberg_cop_kill## Cops. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
STRYK VS. the Law Headshot IV
Complete First World Bank on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.
Using the Compact-5, defeat ##mp5_shield_head_shot## Shields with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
You are GOLDEN! OVERKILL salutes you!
Defeat ##law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Trip Mines VS. the Law IV
Defeat ##melee_law_kill## Law enforcers with melee attacks.
In NO MERCY, get the power back up within 5 seconds of it being shut down. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Beat HEAT STREET on normal difficulty or above without anyone getting downed. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Using the STRYK, defeat ##glock_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Aquire one billion dollars in total cash. One. BILLION. Dollars.
Three guys went on a Trip
Complete First World Bank on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
Using the Locomotive 12G, defeat ##mossberg_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
On GREEN BRIDGE, destroy all the lights in the main scaffolding tower. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
...and that's a lot of cash VII
Me VS. the Law Headshot III
Complete Diamond Heist on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.
Complete UNDERCOVER on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Defeat ##spooc_kill## Cloakers. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Me VS. the Law Headshot V
Complete COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty, without being taken into custody.
In multiplayer, find a Xmas present on any level.
STRYK VS. the Law Headshot I
Using the B9-S, defeat ##beretta92_taser_kill## tasers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Defeat ##heavy_swat_kill## Heavy SWAT. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Get traded for a hostage in your first game.
Complete Panic Room on OVERKILL difficulty.

Complete Diamond Heist on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.

Complete Heat Street on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.

Complete Slaughterhouse on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.
Defeat a Law enforcer while you're in custody.
Using the Amcar-4, defeat ##m4_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Complete Diamond Heist on OVERKILL difficulty.
Beat GREEN BRIDGE on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
You can run but you can't hide
Complete Diamond Heist on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
Get 30 kills using 30 shots, using only the M308 Rifle.
Beat FIRST WORLD BANK on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Using the Amcar-4, defeat ##m4_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Defeat ##cop_kill## Cops. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!

Complete Green Bridge on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.

I pushed the button and lived!
Defeat ##fbi_kill## FBI Agents. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the M308, defeat ##m14_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the GL40, defeat ##m79_law_simultaneous_kills## Law enforcers simultaneously.
Force ##tiedown_swat## blue SWATs to cuff themselves.
Go into bleedout from enemy fire.
Beat COUNTERFEIT without letting any hostage escape or die. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
First World Bank: Don't lose face
Complete Diamond Heist on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
Steal all the sapphires in DIAMOND HEIST on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Defeat 100 law enforcers in a single heist.
Trip Mines VS. the Law II
Complete COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Complete First World Bank heist on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Complete one entire successful session without getting downed.
Defeat ##taser_kill## Tasers. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
...and that's a lot of cash X
Defeat ##trip_mine_law_kill## Law enforcers using your Trip Mines. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!

Using the Mark 11, defeat ##mac11_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Complete Heat Street on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.

Trip Mines VS. the Law I
Bypassing all 3 consoles before raising the alarm, beat DIAMOND HEIST on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Beat a heist on normal difficulty or above, having killed a Bulldozer without taking damage from any Bulldozer. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

Complete Panic Room on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
In NO MERCY, cut the correct wire opening the ICU door security system. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

Defeat two Law enforcers with a single Trip Mine.
Complete UNDERCOVER on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.

Beat all original heists on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Using the AK, defeat ##ak47_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
On UNDERCOVER, place 20 planks by yourself on windows, vents or fences.
Using the Reinbeck 880, defeat ##reinbeck_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the Bronco .44, defeat ##bronco_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Defeat three Law enforcers with a single Trip Mine.

In PANIC ROOM, kill all armed thugs in and around the apartment building within 60 seconds of you and your crew drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Defeat ##swat_kill## blue SWAT. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the Mark 11, defeat ##mac11_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Complete Panic Room on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.
I've fallen - and I can't get up!
Complete Green Bridge on OVERKILL difficulty.
Force ##tiedown_fbi## FBI agents to cuff themselves.
Complete Panic Room on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
Force ##tiedown_smep## HEAVY SWATS to cuff themselves.
Defeat a law enforcer planting C4 in FIRST WORLD BANK on hard difficulty or above. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Using the Locomotive 12G, defeat ##mossberg_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the B9-S, defeat ##beretta92_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the Bronco .44, defeat ##bronco_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the Bronco .44, defeat ##bronco_tank_kill## bulldozers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the Brenner 21, defeat ##hk21_shield_kill## Shields. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Four guys went on a Trip
Defeat ##bleed_out_kill## Law enforcers while you're in bleedout. Using Trip Mines or Sentry Gun does not count towards this challenge!
Defeat ##bleed_out_multikill## Law enforcers during a single bleedout.
Get revived by one of your crew mates.
Force ##tiedown_cop## Police officers to cuff themselves.
...and that's a lot of cash VI
First World Bank: Like a pro
Complete First World Bank on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
Complete Heat Street on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
Complete Heat Street on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Complete Green Bridge on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Complete Panic Room on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Complete Slaughterhouse on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
Finish a heist in custody while all your team mates are alive. (4 teammates).
Trade all the butchers in SLAUGHTERHOUSE.
Get the armored car to drop without shooting at it in SLAUGHTERHOUSE. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Find ten money bundles in PANIC ROOM.
In PANIC ROOM, take the key from Chavez within the first 45 seconds of starting the mission. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Destroy all the cameras in FIRST WORLD BANK within 10 seconds of drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

Don't let any law enforcers reach the graffiti on the center of the roof in PANIC ROOM from the SECURE THE ROOF objective until the ESCAPE objective on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Defeat 25 FBI agents in a row.
In DIAMOND HEIST, defeat all twelve Patrol Guards using only trip mines. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Complete the GREEN BRIDGE on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
In DIAMOND HEIST, get Bain to come back for you at least 7 times on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
In DIAMOND HEIST, get the big diamond and escape on OVERKILL difficulty with you and all your team mates alive. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Beat any heist on OVERKILL difficulty with three other players who are all using the Noob Lube perk. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Gain a level in the Assault tree during an assault.
Gain a level in the Sharpshooter tree with your last kill being a Sniper.
Gain a level in the Support tree while reviving a teammate.
STRYK VS. the Law Headshot III
AK VS. the Law Headshot I
AK VS. the Law Headshot II
AK VS. the Law Headshot IV

SENTRY GUN VS. the Law III
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law IV
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law V
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law VI

SENTRY GUN Kills in a Row III
Using the AK, defeat ##ak47_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the GL40, defeat ##m79_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the STRYK, defeat ##glock_shield_body_shot## Shields with bodyshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the AK, defeat ##ak47_taser_kill## Tasers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
Using the SENTRY GUN, defeat ##sentry_gun_law_kill## Law enforcers.
Be in a team that places four Sentry Guns during a heist.
Using the GL40, defeat ##m79_simultaneous_specials## Special Units simultaneously.
Complete UNDERCOVER on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
In for a Dime, In for a Dollar
Complete COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
Complete COUNTERFEIT on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.

Beat UNDERCOVER with everyone in the crew only using the GL40. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!

Beat any heist using the STRYK Pistol, AK Rifle, GL40 Grenade Launcher, Toolkit upgrade, Sentry Gun equipment and Big Game Hunters crew bonus. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Beat COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty or above without killing any law enforcers or civilians. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.
On COUNTERFEIT, manage to defuse all C4 charges.
Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Beat PANIC ROOM on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Lots of pigs, but no pigs
Beat DIAMOND HEIST on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Reach level 145. This gives you the presidential masks for further campaigning.
Complete NO MERCY on hard or OVERKILL without any civilian raising the alarm. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
Complete NO MERCY on OVERKILL difficulty, having sawed open all three ICU security doors. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
